name: Evolution Sandbox [DEMO]
description:
This is the Demo for an Evolution Simulator. The only thing in this demo so far is cell mutations that you can play around with.

Important Note

The browser version is really buggy so I strongly advise you to download the .zip and play it as the windows build.

The "Trail Strength" slider does not do what it suppose to... if you are in firefox it could fix it to go to full screen, any other browser just won't allow this to work.
